Trident: 2.01=Currently partially supported in nightly builds for the Linux platform.[250]

Presto: 2.111=WebSocket support was added in Presto 2.7[260] but was disabled due to security reasons.[261] In Presto 2.11 protocol implementation was updated to version RFC 6455[262] which resolved security issue.
2.61=Geolocation support was added in Presto 2.5, but was not enabled by default until 2.6.[271][272][68][69]

Gecko: 1.91=Limited to the feed protocol in 1.8; fully supported in 1.9.[186]date=May 2014

Trident: 1.81=Limited to feed MIME types in 1.8 and 1.9.[189]
